name: marbefes-bbt-database
description: MARBEFES BBT Database - Marine Biodiversity and Ecosystem Functioning Database

scripts.build:watch: while true; do python build_bundle.py; inotifywait -qre modify static/js/; done

author: MARBEFES Project

notes.bundler: This project uses a Python-based bundler (build_bundle.py) instead of Rollup/Webpack. The Python bundler integrates with Flask version management, provides versioned cache-busting, and requires only 'terser' for minification (via npx).

scripts.build: Build JavaScript bundle with Python bundler
scripts.build:watch: Auto-rebuild bundle when JavaScript files change (requires inotify-tools)
scripts.minify: Verify terser is available for minification
